title: Weaver's Lament
description: Charlotte's magical adventures continue in Weaver's Lament, the sequel to Emma Newman's Brother's Ruin.Charlotte is learning to control her emerging magical prowess under the secret tutelage of Magus Hopkins. Her first covert mission takes her to a textile mill where the disgruntled workers are apparently in revolt.But it isnâ€™t the workers causing the trouble. The real culprits are far more extranormal in nature.And they have a grudge to settle.
author: Emma Newman
